entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
